events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund because the size does not fit me at all.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to sizing issues, categorizing the case appropriately.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle the customer's case and to follow up soon.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket purchase.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is still unused and in its original packaging?
The order number is 8654321. Yes, the jacket is unused and still in the original packaging as I received it.
Thank you for the information. You are eligible for a full refund. Please use the prepaid return label we will email shortly.
Thanks for the quick help! I appreciate the prepaid label, it makes the return process much easier.
The return process has been set up. Once we receive the jacket back, the refund will be processed promptly to your original payment method.
We are following up to confirm you received your refund for the returned jacket and if you need any further assistance.
The refund case for the jacket has been closed successfully as the refund was completed and customer confirmed satisfaction.
